PN.content:
Please identify the "Property Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: Indeed , DPP - based conjugated polymers have achieved impressive PCEs up to 9% by the combination of DPP and various electron - donating building blocks.

Let's think step by step.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| DPP |
| PCEs |
| electron - donating building blocks |

Explanation:

* DPP (Diketopyrrolopyrrole) is a type of conjugated polymer.
* PCEs (Power Conversion Efficiencies) is a property that measures the efficiency of a solar cell in converting sunlight into electricity.
* electron - donating building blocks are materials that can donate electrons to DPP in order to improve the charge transfer and thus increase the PCEs.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Property Name |
| --- |
| PCEs |

Explanation:

* PCEs (Power Conversion Efficiencies) is the only valid property name in the paragraph that clearly refers to a material property.
* DPP and electron-donating building blocks are types of materials, not material properties.
